column1: Little Goat Diner////This review is based on the Valentine's Dinner held upstairs at Little Goat Diner previewing the food at Cabra.  Since Stephanie Izard is my favorite
column2: we go to this dinner every year and once again
column3: she did not disappoint.  This year the format of the dinner changed and it seems as if the price went up. (Neither here nor there). From beginning to end
column4: each course did not disappoint.  The richness and complexity of the food made us excited for when the actual Cabra restaurant opened up (writing that review next).  Stephanie definitely has a talent for creating deliciousness that is appreciated. We couldn't decide which was our favorite course because they were all so good!
